high_descs: Turn to face the green counter top ahead of you
Pick up the candle stick on top of the green counter top
Carry the candle stick to face the left side of the counter top where the far left drawer is
Place the candle stick inside of the drawer then shut the drawer
anns.task_desc: Move a candle to the drawer

high_descs: Walk forward to the candle on the counter by the sink.
Pick up the candle from the counter.
Move slightly backwards away from the counter top.
Put the candle in the top drawer under the bottle of soap, then close the drawer.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from a counter top to a drawer.

high_descs: Walk forward to reach the counter of the sink.
Pick up the candlestick from the counter.
Turn to face the drawers below the counter.
Put the candlestick away in the upper lefthand drawer.
anns.task_desc: Put a candlestick away in a drawer.
